Package net.agilhard.maven.plugins.jpackager

Class JPackagerMojo

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.maven.plugin.AbstractMojo
      • net.agilhard.maven.plugins.jlink.AbstractPackageToolMojo
        • net.agilhard.maven.plugins.jpackager.JPackagerMojo
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.maven.plugin.ContextEnabled, org.apache.maven.plugin.Mojo
    @Mojo(name="jpackager",
      requiresDependencyResolution=RUNTIME,
      defaultPhase=PACKAGE,
      requiresProject=true)
public class JPackagerMojo
extends AbstractPackageToolMojo
    The JPackager goal is intended to create a native installer package file based on http://openjdk.java.net/jeps/343.
    Author:
    Bernd Eilers
